title: FNI
name: Fiber Network Identification
definition: Identifies all services associated with a particular fiber based network. Also may identify customer ring and associated rin g  services.
fieldNotes: The Fiber Network Identification data will be assigned by the provider.
validEntries: Valid Fiber Network Identification  N = New
validEntryNotes: A valid entry of "N" is used when an FNI has not previously been assigned.
usageNotes:
Required when the first position of the REQTYP field is "R" and the UNE field is not populated. 
Required for DS1/DS3 within a fiber network  w hen the ACT field is "N", "C", "M", "T" or "R" and the UNE field is not populated. 
Required for services riding a dedicated ring  w hen the ACT field is "N", "C", "M", "T" or "R" and the UNE field is not populated. 
Otherwise prohibited.
